name: RPDM Gil!
description:
RPDM Gil!

RPDM Gil or, Re Parate De Mano gil! It's a two player local game about handstanding fight in a beach!

Made it for the GGJ2020 at Rosario GGJ.

Controls:

  1. player: wasd and q to kick
  2. player: arrows and right ctrl to kick

or you can use joysticks

Credits:

  • Ignacio Puccini - programming and game design
  • Cesar Hernan Acevedo - graphics design
  • Robertino Malamud - Music and SFX
  • Based on Evan Greenwood physics talk demo.
